# Nabin Khair — Portfolio (nabinkhair.com.np)

> Portfolio & blog of Nabin Khair — Full-stack/Frontend developer (Next.js, TypeScript, React). Guidance for AI assistants and agents consuming this site.  
> Maintainer: Nabin Khair · Contact: https://www.nabinkhair.com.np/contact · Updated: 2025-08-23

This file lists LLM-friendly entry points and usage notes. Please respect the “How to use” and “Crawl guidance” sections.

## Key content
- Home: https://www.nabinkhair.com.np/
- Projects: https://www.nabinkhair.com.np/projects
- Blog index: https://www.nabinkhair.com.np/blog
- Recent posts :

  - 2025-04-02 — https://www.nabinkhair.com.np/blog/introducing-civen-ai
  - (More on the blog index)

- Contact (form): https://www.nabinkhair.com.np/contact

## Other properties (separate apps/sites)
- FlowMint: https://flow.nabinkhair.com.np/
- V Theme site: https://vthemes.nabinkhair.com.np/
- ENV Store: https://envstore.nabinkhair.com.np/
- Gemini microsite: https://gemini.nabinkhair.com.np/

## APIs & data
- No public APIs documented at this time.

## How to use this content
- Preferred use: INFERENCE_ONLY
- Attribution: Appreciated. When summarizing, include the canonical page URL.
- Respect noindex/robots directives and do not capture gated or user-specific content.

## Crawl guidance
- Max request rate: 3 req/min (suggested crawl-delay ~10s).
- Fetch only linked, stable URLs; avoid query-string permutations not linked from the site.
- Prefer Blog and Projects pages for topic overviews and recent updates.

## Content notes
- This is a personal portfolio/blog; content evolves. Use each post’s on-page publication date when available.
- Text, images, and media © Nabin Khair unless otherwise noted.

## Preferred citation
- Nabin Khair (2025). *Portfolio*. https://www.nabinkhair.com.np/

## Policies
- Robots: https://www.nabinkhair.com.np/robots.txt (if present)
- Privacy/Terms: Not published here; if added later, link them in this section.

## Security
- Report security issues via the contact form: https://www.nabinkhair.com.np/contact (include “SECURITY” in the subject).
